itunes:title: Episode 731 - The Black Rifle Coffee Company Controversy Explained
title: Episode 731 - The Black Rifle Coffee Company Controversy Explained
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Jarred Taylor to talk about the internet mob that came at the Black Rifle Coffee Company after Kyle Rittenhouse wore their shirt after he was released from jail, plus Professor Scott Galloway tells Ross and D...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Jarred Taylor to talk about the internet mob that came at the Black Rifle Coffee Company after Kyle Rittenhouse wore their shirt after he was released from jail, plus Professor Scott Galloway tells Ross and Dan how social media algorithms are trained to enrage us and why Big Tech should be broken up and which tech companies the government will break up first.
